channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Easy Accept Payments for PayPal
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Easy Accept Payments for PayPal

item.title: CVE-2023-0275|2023-02-13T14:32:18.294Z -- unknown -- easy%20accept%20payments%20for%20paypal
item.description: The Easy Accept Payments for PayPal WordPress plugin before 4.9.10 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
